start.title: <0>Let's go</0> <1>beyond Gameplay</1>
start.catchphrase: Streams can be much more than just a video!

presentation.title: <0>A world where new gaming experiences</0> <1>can come alive.</1>

collect.title: Collect
collect.description: Create your deck by collecting the cards of the best Streamers you can find! You'll need them to participate into their exclusive events & our Fantasy Leagues!

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Trade with other members of the SKULT Community across the globe. Sell the cards you won't need: real cash is coming your way!

compete.title: Compete
compete.description: Draft your Squad and enter weekly Leagues. Your final score will depend on the real-world performances of your Streamers.

collectiblesUseCases.title: What can you do with <1>your Cards</1>?
collectiblesUseCases.catchphrase: Watching is over. It’s time to participate

events.title: Participate in Exclusive Events
events.description: Your cards can unlock immersive events created by your favorite Streamers, exclusively for you! Game sessions, drops, giveaways, exclusive content, in real life events... Everything is possible!

iryanne.name: World of Warcraft - Community raid
iryanne.description: “I need 10 mates for the Black Temple raid in World of Warcraft! Silver Card holders: I need YOU! Come and join me! Let’s play together during my stream session this weekend!”

gpu.name: Graphics card to win!
gpu.description: “Raffle! I have a RTX 3080 Ti to give to one of my card holders! Enter the raffle and get a chance to bring it home! The winner will be drawn from all those that will check-in with their card!”

worlds.name: Come with me to the Worlds!
worlds.description: “I’m playing at the League of Legends Worlds and I can bring one person with me! YOU, Gold Card holder! Come with me and follow the event from the backstage!”

fantasyLeagues.title: Streamers Fantasy Leagues
fantasyLeagues.description: Every week, participate alongside other Leaguers in SKULT Fantasy Leagues by drafting your Dream Squad! The in-game actions of the Streamers you have chosen will contribute to your final score! At the end of the week, earn rewards based on the number of points you have!
fantasyLeagues.catchphrase: Will you have what it takes?

develop.title: Develop your Community
develop.description: Get discovered thanks to level-based games: any Streamer can get an audience!

boost.title: Boost Engagement
boost.description: Grow your fan base and increase interactions with your followers.

earn.title: Earn Cash
earn.description: From your cards and your in-game actions. The better you play and the best you entertain your fans, the more valuable you are!

fun.title: Get fun while following your favorite Streamers
fun.description: Enroll Streamers in your Team through their cards and participate in their exclusive and personalized events!

play.title: Play & Earn Rewards
play.description: Challenge other participants in SKULT immersive games, and get rewarded. Our first game is a Fantasy League!

earn.title: Earn Cash
earn.description: Keep your team strong and sell other Streamers you don't need: earn cash from card trading

modal.text: <0>Hey, thanks for your interest!</0><1>We're COMING SOON!</1><2>To be updated, join our Discord</2>

team.title: <0>The <2>dream</2> team</0>
team.cta: Hey! We're hiring! Join the squad!
